snippet: Suspicion appeared to be focused on a campus election bitterly contested along religious and ethnic lines.
abstract: Assailants kill at least 25 people at Federal Polytechnic, college in northeastern Nigeria; attacks may be related to a campus election that was bitterly contested along religious and ethnic lines.
lead_paragraph: Suspicion appeared to be focused on a campus election bitterly contested along religious and ethnic lines.

headline.seo: At Least 25 Are Killed at Nigerian College
headline.main: Attack at Nigerian College Leaves at Least 25 Dead
headline.print_headline: Attack at Nigerian College Leaves at Least 25 Dead
